name: Raikou
author: Ken Sugimori
flavor_text: The rain clouds it carries let it fire thunderbolts at will. They say that it descended with lightning.

abilities.name: Lightning Burst
abilities.effect: Whenever you attach a {L} Energy card from your hand to Raikou, if your opponent has any Benched Pokémon, he or she chooses 1 of them and switches it with the Defending Pokémon. This power stops working while Raikou is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Lightning Tackle
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, Raikou does 20 damage to itself.
